property.value: "The dead have it easy. They suffer no more. If breaking their rest helps the living, so be it." —Olka, mistmeadow witch

card.name: Oracle of Nectars
card.property: {X}, {T}: You gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When elves find a fount of beauty, they protect it. Where there is beauty, there is hope.

card.property: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A delicate veil of glamers can prove as sturdy as iron.

card.name: Rattleblaze Scarecrow
card.property: Rattleblaze Scarecrow has persist as long as you control a black creature. (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.) Rattleblaze Scarecrow has haste as long as you control a red creature.

card.name: Oversoul of Dusk
card.property: Protection from blue, from black, and from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some say she hid the sun herself, a desperate act to save it from its ultimate extinction." —The Seer's Parables

card.name: Presence of Gond
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

card.name: Plumeveil
card.property: Flash Defender, flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was vast, a great sheet of soaring wings, and equally silent. It caught us unawares and blocked our view of the kithkin stronghold." —Grensch, merrow cutthroat

card.name: Wheel of Sun and Moon
card.property: Enchant player If a card would be put into enchanted player's graveyard from anywhere, instead that card is revealed and put on the bottom of that player's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every life ends, but life itself never does.

card.name: Manaforge Cinder
card.property: {1}: Add {B} or {R}. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cinder mystics set traps for sluaghs and other spirits of flame, seeking to extract the secrets of the fire their own hearts have lost.

card.name: Curse of Chains
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of each upkeep, tap enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant's real punishment was the fleeting moment when he was allowed to stand before being dragged down to his knees again.

card.name: Impromptu Raid
card.property: {2} {R/G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it isn't a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, put that card onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Scuzzback gang, it's always "raid o'clock."

card.name: Mudbrawler Raiders
card.property: Mudbrawler Raiders can't be blocked by blue creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To reach the ravine of the Wanderbrine River, they were told to take the shortcut "through the mountains." They took the directions literally.

card.name: Mudbrawler Cohort
card.property: Haste Mudbrawler Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another red creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before a raid, the members of Wort's gang egg each other on with tales of their hunger and what they'll do to sate it, each outdoing the last.

card.name: Dawnglow Infusion
card.property: You gain X life if {G} was spent to cast Dawnglow Infusion and X life if {W} was spent to cast it. (Do both if {G}{W} was spent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dawnglove bloom is a potent nostrum, but the dawnglow brewed from its sap is nothing less than life itself.

card.name: Tattermunge Witch
card.property: {R} {G}: Each blocked creature gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Tattermunge gang has no words for the spell that whips their instinctual rage into a frenzy. They only know they like it.

card.name: Loch Korrigan
card.property: {U/B}: Loch Korrigan gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't look upon still waters without first breaking the surface. The korrigan will catch you with her gaze and drag you to your death." —Kithkin superstition

card.name: Blight Sickle
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has wither. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its scars cut deeper than its blade.

card.name: Inquisitor's Snare
card.property: Prevent all damage target attacking or blocking creature would deal this turn. If that creature is black or red, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Driven by their paranoia, kithkin inflict on their foes all the agonies they believe would have been inflicted on them.

card.name: Mirrorweave
card.property: Each other creature becomes a copy of target nonlegendary creature until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who are different are untrustworthy, unpredictable. Put your safety in the hands of your own kind." —Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

card.name: Dramatic Entrance
card.property: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some things aren't worth waiting for.

card.name: Fossil Find
card.property: Return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand, then reorder your graveyard as you choose.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some secrets want to be revealed. They burst through the soil of their own accord." —Dindun of Kulrath Mine

card.name: Gloomlance
card.property: Destroy target creature. If that creature was green or white, its controller discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death stings the victim only once, but those left behind feel the pain of loss with every passing memory.

card.name: Mass Calcify
card.property: Destroy all nonwhite creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead serve as their own tombstones.

card.name: Bloodshed Fever
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cinder mages enjoy seeing their victims in the throes of bloodlust—and seeing the regret that inevitably follows.

card.name: Intimidator Initiate
card.property: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't stand in his way, for his way is full of pointy things and fire.

card.name: Tattermunge Duo
card.property: Whenever you cast a red spell, Tattermunge Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Whenever you cast a green spell, Tattermunge Duo gains forestwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.

card.name: Demigod of Revenge
card.property: When you cast this spell, return all cards named Demigod of Revenge from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flying, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "His laugh, a bellowing, deathly din, slices through the heavens, making them bleed." —The Seer's Parables

card.name: Wasp Lancer
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I doubt that faeries understand how short their lives are, compared to the rest of us. If they did, would they so readily charge into battle, heedless of the danger before them?" —Awylla, elvish safewright

card.name: Merrow Wavebreakers
card.property: {1} {U}, {Q}: Merrow Wavebreakers gains flying until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The merrows' prey have retreated from the shore, so they have learned to follow.

card.name: Wooded Bastion
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {G/W}, {T}: Add {G}{G}, {G}{W}, or {W}{W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves of Wilt-Leaf Wood continually expand the palisade surrounding the sanctuary. They hope to one day enclose the entire forest within its walls.

card.name: Helm of the Ghastlord
card.property: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card." As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card."

card.name: River Kelpie
card.property: Whenever River Kelpie or another permanent enters the battlefield from a graveyard, draw a card. Whenever a player casts a spell from a graveyard, draw a card. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Whimwader
card.property: Whimwader can't attack unless defending player controls a blue permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thought? Deceit? Progress? Now you're just making it hungry." —Abral, kithkin alchemist

card.name: Fulminator Mage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unsafe Terrain Ahead—Turn Back" —Sign near the former location of Pyrtagh Cairn

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bits of fallen scarecrow, laces of elfskin leather, teeth of an axeshark merrow . . . An industrious soul can find new uses for the most mundane items." —Mowagh the Gwyllion

card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. Whenever a player draws a card, Spiteful Visions deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knowledge brings the sting of disillusionment, but the pain teaches perspective.

card.name: Revelsong Horn
card.property: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A deflated sigh breathed into the horn emerges as an inspiring melody.

card.name: Heap Doll
card.property: Sacrifice Heap Doll: Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know one night it won't come back. Then I'll know it's truly done its job." —Braenna, cobblesmith

card.name: Smolder Initiate
card.property: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life is a circle. Death is a vicious circle."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Verdant bloom does exist. It merely hides for its own safety."

property.value: Mounted cinders circle the blasted peak at Kulrath, hunting the Extinguisher.

property.value: "The cinders find strength in suffering, the elves in beauty. But if you make an elf suffer, he gets weaker. I wonder what happens if you make a cinder beautiful?" —Hrugash, leech bonder

property.value: "These bracers were worn by my father and by his mother before him. Boggart fangs have shattered on them. Cinder flames have withered at their touch. While I wear them, the safehold will not fall."

card.name: Briarberry Cohort
card.property: Flying Briarberry Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another blue creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A clique can cause far more mischief than one faerie on its own.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His blade was forged over coals of moaning treefolk, curved at the optimum angle for severing heads, and heated to volcanic temperatures by his touch.

card.name: Wildslayer Elves
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some elves battled too long in the deep shadow, their swords dipped too often in tainted flesh and poisoned blood.

card.property: ({2/U} can be paid with any two mana or with {U}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.) Look at the top five cards of your library. card.name: Tattermunge Maniac

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shows up at one meal wearing the carcass of the last.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stripped of his sight, he was free to see only the ideal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It awakened to gloom-fouled skies and responded with a righteous rage that shook the heavens.

card.name: Wilt-Leaf Cavaliers
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every elf in Shadowmoor is charged from birth with a terrible duty: to strike back against the ugliness and darkness, even though they are all around and seemingly without end.

card.name: Emberstrike Duo

card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor

card.property: {1} {U/B}, {Q}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Mine Excavation
card.property: Return target artifact or enchantment card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

card.name: Illuminated Folio
card.property: {1}, {T}, Reveal two cards from your hand that share a color: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Wort, the Raidmother

card.name: Blistering Dieflyn

property.value: Any kithkin smith would love to catch a dieflyn for her kiln, relieving her of ever having to gather fuel again.

property.value: The wings are held in place by wicker rods. The rods are held in place by pure faith.

card.name: Safehold Duo

card.name: Viridescent Wisps

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the wisps that night, the once timid boggart saw all the terrible, bloody things he was capable of. And it was glorious.

card.name: Faerie Macabre

property.name: Flavor

property.value: Nothing satisfies a merrow as much as drowning what it cannot have.

card.name: Wicker Warcrawler
card.property: Whenever Wicker Warcrawler attacks or blocks, put a -1/-1 counter on it at end of combat.

card.name: Thornwatch Scarecrow

property.value: Cinders carry an ancestral grudge that makes them slow to trust and quick to retaliate.

card.name: Hungry Spriggan

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Blazethorn Scarecrow

card.name: Cultbrand Cinder
card.property: When Cultbrand Cinder enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your seared flesh will be the first step in your journey to dark enlightenment."

card.name: Woodfall Primus
card.property: Trample When Woodfall Primus enters the battlefield, destroy target noncreature permanent. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Painter's Servant
card.property: As Painter's Servant enters the battlefield, choose a color. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It gathers hues from the twilight mist so that its master can paint a better world.

card.name: Disturbing Plot
card.property: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

card.name: Mistmeadow Skulk
card.property: Lifelink, protection from converted mana cost 3 or greater

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Doyo suspected the boggarts of brewing a plot against his crop, so he scythed away his grain to clear the sightlines.

card.name: Shield of the Oversoul
card.property: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and has indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.) As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Wingrattle Scarecrow
card.property: Wingrattle Scarecrow has flying as long as you control a blue creature. Wingrattle Scarecrow has persist as long as you control a black creature. (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Corrupt
card.property: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are things beneath the murk for whom the bog is a stew, a thin broth in need of meat.

card.name: Furystoke Giant
card.property: When Furystoke Giant enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals 2 damage to any target" until end of turn. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Gravelgill Axeshark
card.property: Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their sharp scales would make good armor, if they'd just stay dead." —Taeryn, cinder armorkeep

card.name: Corrosive Mentor
card.property: Black creatures you control have wither. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Guttering cinders stoke their dying flames by snuffing out the lights of others.

card.name: Oona's Gatewarden
card.property: Defender, flying Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So now you've seen Glen Elendra. Take a good look. It will be the last thing you'll ever see."

card.name: Ashenmoor Cohort
card.property: Ashenmoor Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another black creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "None will concede a place for us in this world. If it is not for us, neither shall it be for them. We rest not until they choke in its cold ashes." —Illulia of Nighthearth

card.name: Fracturing Gust
card.property: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments. You gain 2 life for each permanent destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elvish dawnhands test a relic's worthiness before collecting it for the safehold. If it can't stand up to a stiff breeze, it's left behind.

card.name: Faerie Swarm
card.property: Flying Faerie Swarm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of blue permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Untouched by the Aurora, Oona's faeries greeted the night like any other day.

card.name: Aethertow
card.property: Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library. Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

card.name: Gloomwidow
card.property: Reach Gloomwidow can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When gloomwidows mature, they abandon venom in favor of massive webs that span the eaves of cliffs.

card.name: Ember Gale
card.property: Creatures target player controls can't block this turn. Ember Gale deals 1 damage to each white and/or blue creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Terrible wind. It whipped sparks into our skin, then stoked them even hotter!" —Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

card.name: Scarscale Ritual
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some words are too important to trust to something as fragile as memory.

card.name: Splitting Headache
card.property: Choose one — • Target player discards two cards. • Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All faeries delve for dreams. But not all wait for their victims to fall asleep.

card.name: Turn to Mist
card.property: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Did you expect me to dodge? How quaint." —Olka, mistmeadow witch

card.name: Inescapable Brute
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Inescapable Brute must be blocked if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you think you made it past him alive, he's just teasing you.

card.name: Deepchannel Mentor
card.property: Blue creatures you control can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rivers can no longer provide safe passage for travelers and commerce. They serve only as highways for raiders and channels for blood and woe.

card.name: Order of Whiteclay

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made from the clay of burial mounds, the face paint of the priests is a sign of their respect for those whose rest they interrupt.

card.name: Torpor Dust
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some folk these days are too restless to dream the dreams we need. We need to teach them to stop and catch their breath."

card.name: Mossbridge Troll
card.property: If Mossbridge Troll would be destroyed, regenerate it. Tap any number of untapped creatures you control other than Mossbridge Troll with total power 10 or greater: Mossbridge Troll gets +20/+20 until end of turn.

card.name: Memory Sluice
card.property: Target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

card.name: Toil to Renown
card.property: You gain 1 life for each tapped artifact, creature, and land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The last survivor of her patrol, the warrior returned expecting disappointment and scorn. Instead she found gratitude. "You are alive. That is reason to celebrate."

card.name: Mercy Killing
card.property: Target creature's controller sacrifices it, then creates X 1/1 green and white Elf Warrior creature tokens, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will give you the peace you seek, though you may not yet know you seek it."

card.name: Puncture Bolt
card.property: Puncture Bolt deals 1 damage to target creature. Put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cinder pyromancers measure their success by counting their enemies' smoking holes.

card.name: Zealous Guardian
card.property: Flash

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Parapet watchers patrol the outer edges of the doun, signaling to others who wait patiently in shadow.

card.name: Ghastlord of Fugue
card.property: Ghastlord of Fugue can't be blocked. Whenever Ghastlord of Fugue deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player exiles that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is a ghost that has never known life." —The Seer's Parables

card.name: Murderous Redcap
card.property: When Murderous Redcap enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to any target. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: River's Grasp
card.property: If {U} was spent to cast River's Grasp, return up to one target creature to its owner's hand. If {B} was spent to cast River's Grasp, target player reveals their hand, you choose a nonland card from it, then that player discards that card. (Do both if {U}{B} was spent.)

card.name: Barkshell Blessing
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

card.name: Grim Poppet
card.property: Grim Poppet enters the battlefield with three -1/-1 counters on it. Remove a -1/-1 counter from Grim Poppet: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beware a scarecrow bearing gifts—especially sloshing vessels of acid.

card.name: Armored Ascension
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Plains you control and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why enchant feathers to make them sturdy when we can enchant shields to make them fly?" —Braenna, cobblesmith

card.name: Guttural Response
card.property: Counter target blue instant spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wort had a raiding-bellow that could shatter steel, melt auras, and slice countermagic in half.

card.name: Juvenile Gloomwidow
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gloomwidow venom is particularly virulent during the spider's first years, when it does most of its hunting near the forest floor.

card.name: Crabapple Cohort
card.property: Crabapple Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another green creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seven wives made seven pies from seven apples, each plucked from its branches. Now bare and bitter, it comes to exact its price: one apple, one bone.

card.name: Sinking Feeling
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. Enchanted creature has "{1}, Put a -1/-1 counter on this creature: Untap this creature."

card.name: Manamorphose
card.property: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a moment, objects of pure mana glimmered in the wonderstruck boggart's hands. In the next moment, they were in his mouth, as he chewed contentedly.

card.name: Last Breath
card.property: Exile target creature with power 2 or less. Its controller gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tsk. You'd think those nasty merrows would know how to hold their breath." —Olka, mistmeadow witch

card.name: Savor the Moment
card.property: Take an extra turn after this one. Skip the untap step of that turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The merrow took a moment for herself. She never gave it back.

card.name: Cinderbones
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) {1}{B}: Regenerate Cinderbones.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all coals lie quietly in their beds of cold ash.

card.name: Tyrannize
card.property: Target player discards their hand unless they pay 7 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can stab you where it hurts, or where you will feel absolutely nothing." —Illulia of Nighthearth

card.name: Ashenmoor Gouger
card.property: Ashenmoor Gouger can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After his hands had crumbled away, leaving only wickedly sharp points, he decided his only purpose was war.

card.name: Elemental Mastery
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste, where X is this creature's power. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step."

card.name: Torrent of Souls
card.property: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

card.name: Boggart Ram-Gang
card.property: Haste Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're going to need a bigger gate." —Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

card.name: Drove of Elves
card.property: Hexproof Drove of Elves's power and toughness are each equal to the number of green permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The light of beauty protects our journeys through darkness."

card.name: Knollspine Dragon
card.property: Flying When Knollspine Dragon enters the battlefield, you may discard your hand and draw cards equal to the damage dealt to target opponent this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It woke to find a vast world in need of a master.

card.name: Spell Syphon
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each blue permanent you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Warrik Brutehexer felt betrayed that his aura favored the depths of the Wanderbrine River over its rightful place, hovering around him.

card.name: Raking Canopy
card.property: Whenever a creature with flying attacks you, Raking Canopy deals 4 damage to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Raven's Run has awoken, and ravens will no longer cry in its branches." —Roon Ghastbark

card.name: Sootwalkers
card.property: Sootwalkers can't be blocked by white creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why allow the fires of others to burn, when ours do not? Why leave them content, while we suffer? If there is to be misery, let it be borne by all."

card.name: Trip Noose
card.property: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A taut slipknot trigger is the only thing standing between you and standing.

card.name: Gloomwidow's Feast
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying. If that creature was blue or black, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each night, gloomwidows cull fresh prey for their ravenous hatchlings.

card.name: Power of Fire
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cinders believe their flame was stolen by one they call the Extinguisher. All who now wield fire draw their desperate wrath.

card.name: Sapseep Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G}.) Sapseep Forest enters the battlefield tapped. {G}, {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more green permanents.

card.name: Sickle Ripper
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His sickle was forged in the heat of another cinder's funeral pyre.

card.name: Swans of Bryn Argoll
card.property: Flying If a source would deal damage to Swans of Bryn Argoll, prevent that damage. The source's controller draws cards equal to the damage prevented this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any being that harms them quickly learns its lesson.

card.name: Dire Undercurrents
card.property: Whenever a blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player draw a card. Whenever a black creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player discard a card.

card.name: Scuzzback Marauders
card.property: Trample Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Horde of Boggarts
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Horde of Boggarts's power and toughness are each equal to the number of red permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Strategies don't come easily to the boggarts' feral minds, but full-on assault hasn't failed them yet.

card.name: Beseech the Queen
card.property: ({2/B} can be paid with any two mana or with {B}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.) Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who hear her go mad with inspiration.

card.name: Elsewhere Flask
card.property: When Elsewhere Flask enters the battlefield, draw a card. Sacrifice Elsewhere Flask: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One night Oona bottled the sky. The next night she aligned the stars and released it.

card.name: Prismwake Merrow
card.property: Flash When Prismwake Merrow enters the battlefield, target permanent becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Seeing is believing" is a fact the merrows ruthlessly exploit in their dealings with the other residents of Shadowmoor.

card.name: Plague of Vermin
card.property: Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of life. Repeat this process until no one pays life. Each player creates a 1/1 black Rat creature token for each 1 life they paid this way.

card.name: Parapet Watchers
card.property: {W/U}: Parapet Watchers gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A kithkin doun is not so much a town as a fortress, built to withstand the constantly besieging darkness. Only those most watchful and trustworthy are tasked with guarding its walls.

card.name: Roughshod Mentor
card.property: Green creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He didn't hear the cries of the treefolk whose branches he snapped or of the elves caught underfoot. He had eyes only for the path ahead.
